alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Volusia County through 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Smyrna Beach, moving southeast at 10 mph. Other strong storms will develop along an outflow boundary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Ormond Beach and New Smyrna Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
